source.note: 句子来源为美国家庭万用英语表达；MVP 以点读+选择为主。

scenes.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
scenes.title: 要求一起玩的时候
learning_goals_zh: 会用英文发起邀请一起玩（孩子）
会用英文回应并引导选择玩法（家长）
能区分“无聊/想换活动/想找人玩”的表达

scenes.title: 下次和你玩（现在不行）
learning_goals_zh: 会用英文礼貌拒绝/推迟（Not now / Sorry. I'm busy）
会用英文给出明确时间或条件（Wait 5 minutes / after I do the dishes）
会用英文追问何时有空（When are you free then?）

scenes.title: 约定玩的时间（计时与承诺）
learning_goals_zh: 会用英文约定时长与开始（Let's play for 20 minutes starting now）
会用英文提醒剩余时间与结束（We only have 5 minutes left / Time's up!）
会用英文协商时长（2 hours is too long…）与强调遵守承诺

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Mommy, play with me.
sentences.en_display: Mommy, play with me.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Ok! Let's see what we can do.
sentences.en_display: OK! Let's see what we can do.
sentences.ch: 好啊，我们来看看可以玩什么。

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Mommy, I'm bored.
sentences.en_display: Mommy, I'm bored.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: It's play time!
sentences.en_display: It's playtime!

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Mom, can you play with me?
sentences.en_display: Mom, can you play with me?

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I wonder what's fun to play.
sentences.en_display: I wonder what's fun to play.
sentences.ch: 我想知道有什么好玩的。

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Do you have anything fun?
sentences.en_display: Do you have anything fun?

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I‗ll stop reading now.
sentences.en_display: I'll stop reading now.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I don't want to watch TV anymore.
sentences.en_display: I don't want to watch TV anymore.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I hate to play alone.
sentences.en_display: I hate playing alone.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I need friends to play together with.
sentences.en_display: I need friends to play with.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Want to have some fun?
sentences.en_display: Want to have some fun?

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Are you ready to have fun?
sentences.en_display: Are you ready to have fun?
sentences.ch: 你准备好要玩有趣的吗？

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Let's find something fun.
sentences.en_display: Let's find something fun.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Yay! Sounds great!
sentences.en_display: Yay! Sounds great!

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Okay. My baby must have been bored.
sentences.en_display: Okay. My baby must have been bored.
sentences.ch: 好，我的宝贝一定很无聊吧。

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Sure. What do you want to do with me,  Sweetheart?
sentences.en_display: Sure. What do you want to do with me, sweetheart?
sentences.ch: 当然，你想跟我玩什么呢，甜心？

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: What should we play?
sentences.en_display: What should we play?

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Do whatever you want to do.
sentences.en_display: Do whatever you want to do.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Let's do anything.
sentences.en_display: Let's do anything.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Mom, let's solve a puzzle.
sentences.en_display: Mom, let's do a puzzle.

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Mommy's feeling good today. I can play with you all day long.
sentences.en_display: Mommy's feeling good today. I can play with you all day long.
sentences.ch: 妈妈今天的状况很好，可以陪你玩一整天。

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: Playing with my baby is the most fun.
sentences.en_display: Playing with my baby is the most fun.
sentences.ch: 跟我的宝贝玩是最有趣的。

sentences.chapter_name: CHAPTER11-01 要求一起玩的时候
sentences.en_raw: I love it when Mommy plays games with me.
sentences.en_display: I love it when Mommy plays games with me.
sentences.ch: 我最喜欢妈妈跟我玩游戏了。

sentences.en_raw: Let's play next time.
sentences.en_display: Let's play next time.

sentences.en_raw: Can't you see Mommy's very busy?
sentences.en_display: Can't you see Mommy's very busy?
sentences.ch: 你没有看到妈妈在忙吗？

sentences.en_raw: Sorry. Mommy's too busy.
sentences.en_display: Sorry. Mommy's too busy.

sentences.en_raw: I'll play with you after I do the dishes.
sentences.en_display: I'll play with you after I do the dishes.

sentences.en_raw: I'm working, sou I'll play with you later.
sentences.en_display: I'm working, so I'll play with you later.
sentences.ch: 我在工作，晚一点再跟你玩。

sentences.en_raw: I can play with you in a minute after work.
sentences.en_display: I can play with you in a minute after work.
sentences.ch: 再一会工作结束后，就能跟你玩。

sentences.en_raw: Can you wait? Thanks.
sentences.en_display: Can you wait? Thanks.

sentences.en_raw: Wait! Let's play a little later.
sentences.en_display: Wait! Let's play a little later.
sentences.ch: 等一下！等一下再一起玩。

sentences.en_raw: Wait for five minutes.
sentences.en_display: Wait for five minutes.

sentences.en_raw: Can you play with me in 5 minutes?
sentences.en_display: Can you play with me in five minutes?
sentences.ch: 五分钟后，你能跟我玩吗？

sentences.en_raw: I want to play right now.
sentences.en_display: I want to play right now.

sentences.en_raw: Play with me right away.
sentences.en_display: Play with me right away.

sentences.en_raw: Not now.
sentences.en_display: Not now.

sentences.en_raw: There's no time today./ I have no time today.
sentences.en_display: There's no time today. / I have no time today.

sentences.en_raw: It's too late. Let's play a lot tomorrow.
sentences.en_display: It's too late. Let's play a lot tomorrow.
sentences.ch: 太晚了，明天我们再大玩特玩。

sentences.en_raw: There's too much to do right now.
sentences.en_display: There's too much to do right now.
sentences.ch: 现在有太多事要去做了。

sentences.en_raw: Mommy also wants to play with you, but I can't  right now.
sentences.en_display: Mommy also wants to play with you, but I can't right now.
sentences.ch: 妈妈也想跟你玩，但是现在不行。

sentences.en_raw: Ask Daddy to play with you.
sentences.en_display: Ask Daddy to play with you.

sentences.en_raw: Daddy always says he's busy.
sentences.en_display: Daddy always says he's busy.

sentences.en_raw: If I wait, you have to play with me some more.
sentences.en_display: If I wait, you have to play with me some more.
sentences.ch: 如果我等你的话，你一定要跟我多玩一

sentences.en_raw: Then when can you find time?/ When are you  free then?
sentences.en_display: Then when can you find time? / When are you free then?
sentences.ch: 会。那么，你什么时候有时间呢？

sentences.en_raw: You can do it later after playing with me.
sentences.en_display: You can do it later after playing with me.
sentences.ch: 你可以跟我玩之后再去做吧。

sentences.en_raw: How long should we play?
sentences.en_display: How long should we play?

sentences.en_raw: Let's set up a time to play.
sentences.en_display: Let's set a time to play.

sentences.en_raw: I'll set the timer for 30 minutes.
sentences.en_display: I'll set the timer for 30 minutes.

sentences.en_raw: When the timer goes off, we'll stop.
sentences.en_display: When the timer goes off, we'll stop.
sentences.ch: 定时器一响，我们就停止。

sentences.en_raw: Let's play with blocks for 40 minutes starting now.
sentences.en_display: Let's play with blocks for 40 minutes, starting now.
sentences.ch: 现在开始，我们玩积木40分钟。

sentences.en_raw: Let's play at the playground for an hour.
sentences.en_display: Let's play at the playground for an hour.
sentences.ch: 我们在游乐场玩一个小时吧。

sentences.en_raw: I want to play for 2 hours.
sentences.en_display: I want to play for two hours.

sentences.en_raw: 2 hours is too long. Let's play for only 1 hour.
sentences.en_display: Two hours is too long. Let's play for only one hour.
sentences.ch: 两个小时太长，我们就玩一个小时。

sentences.en_raw: Let's promise to play for 20 minutes.
sentences.en_display: Let's promise to play for 20 minutes.

sentences.en_raw: 20 minutes is too short.
sentences.en_display: Twenty minutes is too short.

sentences.en_raw: I need more time to play.
sentences.en_display: I need more time to play.

sentences.en_raw: Just one more round, please.
sentences.en_display: Just one more round, please.

sentences.en_raw: Only for 5 more minutes.
sentences.en_display: Only five more minutes.

sentences.en_raw: Next time, you should keep your word.
sentences.en_display: Next time, you should keep your word.
sentences.ch: 下次，你要遵守你说的话。

sentences.en_raw: Let's finish after 3 more rounds.
sentences.en_display: Let's finish after three more rounds.
sentences.ch: 再玩三次后，我们就结束吧。

sentences.en_raw: We only have 5 minutes left.
sentences.en_display: We only have five minutes left.

sentences.en_raw: Time's up! Done!
sentences.en_display: Time's up! Done!

sentences.en_raw: The alarm went off!
sentences.en_display: The alarm went off!

sentences.en_raw: I want to play more.
sentences.en_display: I want to play more.

sentences.en_raw: When I play, an hour feels like a second.
sentences.en_display: When I play, an hour feels like a second.
sentences.ch: 我玩的时候，一个小时感觉就像一秒钟

sentences.en_raw: You promised to play for an hour, right?
sentences.en_display: You promised to play for an hour, right?

sentences.en_raw: You should tell playtime from work time.
sentences.en_display: You should tell playtime from work time.
sentences.ch: 你应该分清楚玩的时间和学习的时间。

sentences.en_raw: As a kid, all I do is play.
sentences.en_display: As a kid, all I do is play.
sentences.ch: 我是个小孩，我所要做的就是玩。

sentences.en_raw: Mom, I'll play on the playground till 6:00.
sentences.en_display: Mom, I'll play on the playground till 6:00.
sentences.ch: 妈，我会再游乐场玩到6点。

sentences.en_raw: I'll clean up after I finish this game.
sentences.en_display: I'll clean up after I finish this game.
sentences.ch: 等这个游戏结束后，我会整理。
